{"step_by_step_thinking": "The Theory of Deliberate Practice emphasizes focused, repetitive practice with the aim of continual improvement, often with the help of a mentor or coach providing feedback. In the context of Emergency Medicine Training Programs, outcome feedback could be a way to apply this theory. Trainees could practice specific skills or procedures, receive feedback on their performance, and then use that feedback to improve. Therefore, it seems like a potential opportunity to apply the Theory of Deliberate Practice.", "answer_choice": "A. yes"}
